Title: White Pure Lotus Mother of Pearl-Cultured Freshwater Pearls Floral Pin or Brooch
Description: Thank you for visiting our ebay store! A cute accessory to accentuate any style. This pin or brooch from Thailand, features natural mother of pearl with cultured freshwater white pearl center stone. PLEASE NOTE:The handcrafted nature of this product will produce minor differences in design, sizing and weight. Variations will occur from piece to piece, measurements may vary slightly. Includes an original AERAVIDA organza jewelry pouch (comes in various colors), also handmade by our Artisans. Perfect for gift giving to someone special or keep for yourself! AERAVIDA works directly with gifted and talented Artisans from all over the world. At the core of our philosophy is fair trade and fostering a sustainable future for our Artisans. ARTISAN STORY: Khun Nok is a jewelry designer who balances color and textures in harmony and striking contrasts. Her beautiful designs use fine quality local and exotic materials. Khun Nok's designs are well known for her trendy and chic combinations of color and semi-precious stones. K'Nok has a small store in Bangkok and her jewelry business provides community based work for her family and neighbors so that they are able to tend to their family needs. - Material: Stainless Steel, Jewelry Wire - Stone: Mother of Pearl, Cultured Freshwater Pearl | Color: White - Design Measurement: 60 mm | Weight: 27.5 grams - Style: Pin or brooch - Includes an official 'AERAVIDA Fair Trade Sourcing' Card with certified Seal of Authenticity. White Pure Lotus Mother of Pearl-Cultured Freshwater Pearls Floral Pin or Brooch
